Content.Text: Good morning, <MYNAME>. I'm coming in, OK?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, <MYNAME>, how's your farm doing? I
came here today to tell you about a new
<RED>festival</RED> that I decided to throw.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
And that festival is... the <RED>Beekeeping
Festival</RED>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The festival is all about exhibiting
<BLUE>things caught while beekeeping</BLUE> and
judging them on quality.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just like the Crop Festival, <RED>class</RED> and
<RED>brand</RED> are also featured in the
Beekeeping Festival.
<PAGE>
If you win, <BLUE>the shipping price of
things you catch beekeeping</BLUE> goes up!
<PAGE>
It would be great if you enter as a
representative of the town!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Beekeeping Festival is held on
<BLUE>Spring 22</BLUE> from <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the
<GREEN>festival grounds</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
On the day, be sure to come talk to me
at the festival entrance before <BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>,
OK?
<PAGE>
You can't compete if you're late, so
watch the time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The Beekeeping Festival is held every
year on <BLUE>Spring 22</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
As today just happens to be Spring 22,
the festival will take place this
afternoon. Sorry for the short notice!
<PAGE>
It starts from <BLUE>12:00 PM</BLUE> at the <GREEN>festival
grounds</GREEN>, so come talk to me at the
festival entrance before <BLUE>3:00 PM</BLUE>, OK?
<PAGE>
You can't compete if you're late, so
watch the time.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can confirm the festival's details
on the <BLUE>calendar</BLUE>, so look it over if you
need to.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Well then, I must be on my way. Sorry to
barge in so early in the morning. Give
it your best today!
